channel.title: Alot of questions help please!
channel.description:
1. dragonhide, all dragon hide bodys when dropped & in inventory is some wierd object, idk what? when dropped it comes out as a big monster
2. how do i turn dropping items completly off
3. how do i stop godsword dismantling
4. does anyone have a link for mod crows ect. & How to change them
5. how do i make an object Donar & Staff only
6. how do i add donater place only & staffzone
7. how do i make ::yell command donar only
thankyou verymuch & all help is needed

item.title: Alot of questions help please!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[quote=“i bucky i, post:5, topic:357384”]i think i need to add the models where can i find theese
ive searched in models & model requests & none,
could u help in tv?[/quote]

No. Just get a new cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of questions help please!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Thats not necessarily true. There are two models (normally) needed for an item that can be equipped. Normally the drop/inventory model or the Wielding model.

Then I don’t know, it appears your cache may be corrupt or damaged.
In the end I’m not sure at all.

Read full topic

the models. must be ther, as it wields all fine,
and when i search in client side, class 9 or 8
doesnt find item id.

item.title: Alot of questions help please!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

I’m assuming your on a 317 deob.

Okay… first get to understand your client and server’s methods, ints, etc. and get a good knowledge of Java to get started.
First for number 1, that is Client sided. Obviously the models are incorrect or not added to your client.

  1. Use the search button there are tutorials on that i’m sure. (Such as making items disappear upon being dropped).
  2. If when you right click and see ‘Dismantle’ that is client sided. Edit in your class for custom items.
  3. Search
  4. search many tutorials on this.
  5. You can create a command that only is allowed for a donator or member of staff:
    e.g
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("DonatorCommand") && donator == 1) {
  1. Just only allow donators to use the command above

Read full topic
